collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (18 total Queries, 18 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT SUM(views) as total FROM anime_views WHERE viewed_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
SELECT SUM(views) as total FROM anime_views WHERE viewed_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM user_accounts WHERE created_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) as total FROM user_sessions WHERE last_activity >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_ip) as total FROM anime_views WHERE viewed_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 5 MINUTE)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) as total FROM user_sessions WHERE DATE(last_activity) = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_ip) as total FROM anime_views WHERE DATE(viewed_at) = CURDATE()
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) as total FROM user_sessions WHERE last_activity >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY)
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT session_id) as total FROM user_sessions WHERE last_activity >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
SELECT av.anime_id, av.title, SUM(av.views) as total_views FROM anime_views av GROUP BY av.anime_id, av.title ORDER BY total_views DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT HOUR(viewed_at) as hour, SUM(views) as views FROM anime_views WHERE DATE(viewed_at) = CURDATE() GROUP BY HOUR(viewed_at) ORDER BY hour
SELECT DATE(viewed_at) as date, SUM(views) as views FROM anime_views WHERE viewed_at >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 30 DAY) GROUP BY DATE(viewed_at) ORDER BY date
